scripts.webpack-dev:tls: cd ts && export USE_TLS=true && webpack serve --watch --hot --inline --port 8082 --host 0.0.0.0 --output-public-path=https://localhost:8082/build/ --https --cert=../../../misc/localhost.crt --key=../../../misc/localhost.key
scripts.start:tls: npm run build:proto && concurrently --kill-others "go run go/exampleserver/exampleserver.go --enable_tls=true" "npm run webpack-dev:tls"
scripts.start: npm run build:proto && concurrently --kill-others "go run go/exampleserver/exampleserver.go" "npm run webpack-dev"
